sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Service.css"; function Service() { return (

My Awesome Service

Here is a list of what I can do

Website Development

I Use web technologies such as Html,

Css Javascript and Reactjs to

create beautiful and engaging web experiences

Software Engineering

Use software Engineering principles to think and solve

business problems.

Web/API Hosting

Host web applications as well as APIS

to the cloud to get the application up and running.

ReactJs

I use Reactjs to create interactive UIs

Design simple views for each state inapplications

Update and render right components

B2B Technical Support

Communicate directly with client companies

Answering their questions, helping them troubleshoot issues

Javascript

Develop interactive web applications

Build increased interaction and complexity into applications

); } export default Service;
